mapper.select:
select count(*) co from t_order_detail tod left join t_deliveryman td on td.id=tod.deliveryman_id left join t_user tu on tod.user_id = tu.id left join t_shop ts on tod.shop_id = ts.id left join t_coupon tc on tod.coupon_id = tc.id left join t_property tp on tod.state = tp.value and tp.type='order_state'
and tu.name like concat('%',#{userName},'%')
and tu.user_id like concat('%',#{user_id},'%')
and tu.name like concat('%',#{deliverymanName},'%')
and tu.name like concat('%',#{shopName},'%')
and date_format(tod.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')>=#{startTime}
and date_format(tod.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')<=#{endTime}
